name: Disco Driver
description:
Disco Driver

Created for JTA Jam #8

Cruising down the sunset city. Pick up Passengers in your cab and play them some sick jams. Can you work the radio while driving?? KEEP YOUR EYES ON THE ROAD! A chill/annoying game where you have to multitask between steering your cab and using the radio.

Controls:

A & D to Steer

Click the on scrren radio buttons to use the car radio.

Try and Earn as much $$$ as you can or just enjoy the radio :)

NOTE:

The game may freeze when loading in or restarting on your first attempt but yeah just give it a second... XD

Credits:

All music used are under free use under the open domain.
